mapper.sql: p.NAME as personName, d.department_name, v.id, v.plateNo, v.vehicleColor, v.ownerId, v.ownerCompanyId, v.axleCount, v.vehicleType, v.model, v.engineNo, v.VIN, v.RegisterDate, v.IssueDate, v.licenceIssuingAuthority, v.totalMass, v.unladedMass, v.approvedMass, v.containerInsideSize, v.tractionMass, v.remark, v.status, v.createUserId, v.createUserName, v.createDate, v.lastModifyUserId, v.lastModifyUserName, v.lastModifyDate

FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN person p ON v.ownerId = p.id LEFT JOIN portal.department d ON v.ownerCompanyId = d.department_id where v.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update vehicle
plateNo = #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicleColor = #{vehicleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ownerCompanyId = #{ownerCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
axleCount = #{axleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vehicleType = #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engineNo = #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update vehicle set plateNo = #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicleColor = #{vehicleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerCompanyId = #{ownerCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, axleCount = #{axleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicleType = #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engineNo = #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{VIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegisterDate = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IssueDate = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, licenceIssuingAuthority = #{licenceIssuingAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalMass = #{totalMass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unladedMass = #{unladedMass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, approvedMass = #{approvedMass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, containerInsideSize = #{containerInsideSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tractionMass = #{tractionMass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastModifyUserId = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyUserName = #{lastModifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
FROM vehicle v LEFT JOIN person p ON v.ownerId = p.id LEFT JOIN portal.department d ON v.ownerCompanyId = d.department_id where 0=0
and plateNo like concat('%',#{condition.plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.select: select count(*) from vehicle where plateNo=#{plateNo}

select id, plateNo, vehicleColor, ownerId, ownerCompanyId, axleCount, vehicleType, model, engineNo, VIN, RegisterDate, IssueDate, licenceIssuingAuthority, totalMass, unladedMass, approvedMass, containerInsideSize, tractionMass, remark, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, lastModifyUserId, lastModifyUserName, lastModifyDate from vehicle t where 1=1
and ( t.plateNo like concat('%',#{params.keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
order by t.createDate limit 0,20

select id, plateNo, vehicleColor, ownerId, ownerCompanyId, axleCount, vehicleType, model, engineNo, VIN, RegisterDate, IssueDate, licenceIssuingAuthority, totalMass, unladedMass, approvedMass, containerInsideSize, tractionMass, remark, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate, lastModifyUserId, lastModifyUserName, lastModifyDate from vehicle
